name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】『Neverland Paradox』 Ninomae Ina'nis Birthday Live 2023 #INAinaNeverland [yT2ety9RfIo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis performs the final part of her original song 'Meconopsis'.
Ninomae Ina'nis performs a cover of 'Gunjo' by YOASOBI, with on-screen kinetic typography of the lyrics.

subtitles.original: Though I will keep praying endlessly

subtitles.original: A world without love is not the world
subtitles.english: A world without love is not the world

subtitles.english: do I reconcile

subtitles.original: the tour in my memory
subtitles.english: the tour in my memory

subtitles.original: 今がみんなを映し出す最後の一手
subtitles.english: Now is the final move that projects everyone

subtitles.original: 血の誓い
subtitles.english: Blood oath

subtitles.original: 愛の誓い
subtitles.english: Oath of love

subtitles.original: Till death may die
subtitles.english: Till death may die

subtitles.original: Love is now and for forever
subtitles.english: Love is now and for forever

subtitles.original: ああ、いつものように
subtitles.english: Ah, just like always

subtitles.original: 過ぎる日々に欠伸が出る
subtitles.english: I yawn at the passing days

subtitles.original: さんざめく夜、越え、
subtitles.english: Crossing the bustling night,

subtitles.original: 渋谷の街に朝が降る
subtitles.english: Morning falls upon the city of Shibuya

subtitles.original: どこか虚しいような
subtitles.english: A feeling like something is empty,

subtitles.original: そんな気持ち
subtitles.english: Such a feeling

subtitles.original: つまらないな、でもそれでいい
subtitles.english: It's boring, but that's okay

subtitles.original: そんなもんさ、これでいい
subtitles.english: That's just how it is, this is fine

subtitles.original: 知らず知らず隠してた
subtitles.english: The true voice I've been hiding unconsciously

subtitles.original: 本当の声を響かせてよ、ほら
subtitles.english: Let it ring out, look

subtitles.original: 見ないフリしていても
subtitles.english: Even if I pretend not to see

subtitles.original: 確かにそこに、ある
subtitles.english: It's definitely right there

subtitles.original: ああ、感じたままに描く
subtitles.english: Ah, I paint it as I feel it

subtitles.original: 自分で選んだその色で
subtitles.english: With the colors that I chose myself

subtitles.original: 眠い空気纏う朝に
subtitles.english: In the morning wrapped in sleepy air

subtitles.original: 訪れた青い世界
subtitles.english: A blue world has arrived

subtitles.original: 好きなものを好きだと言う
subtitles.english: Saying I like the things I like

subtitles.original: 怖くて仕方ないけれど
subtitles.english: I'm so scared I can't help it, but

subtitles.original: 本当の自分に出会えた気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like I was able to meet my true self

subtitles.original: ああ、手を伸ばせば伸ばすほどに
subtitles.english: Ah, the more I reach out my hand

subtitles.original: 遠くへゆく
subtitles.english: The further away it goes

subtitles.original: 思うようにいかない今日も
subtitles.english: Even today, when things don't go as planned

subtitles.original: また慌ただしくもがいてる
subtitles.english: I'm struggling hectically again

subtitles.original: 悔しい気持ちもただ情けなくて
subtitles.english: Even the frustrating feelings are just miserable

subtitles.original: 涙が出る
subtitles.english: And the tears fall

subtitles.original: 踏み込むほど苦しくなる
subtitles.english: The further I step in, the more painful it becomes

subtitles.original: 痛くもなる
subtitles.english: It starts to hurt too

subtitles.original: ああ、感じたままに進む
subtitles.english: Ah, I move forward as I feel it

subtitles.original: 自分で選んだこの道を
subtitles.english: Along this path that I chose myself

subtitles.original: 重いまぶた擦る夜に
subtitles.english: In the night when I rub my heavy eyelids

subtitles.original: しがみついた青い誓い
subtitles.english: I clung to the blue oath

subtitles.original: 好きなことを続けること
subtitles.english: Continuing to do what I love

subtitles.original: それは「楽しい」だけじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not just about 'having fun'

subtitles.original: 本当にできる？不安になるけど
subtitles.english: Can I really do it? I get anxious, but

subtitles.original: 何回でも、ほら何回でも
subtitles.english: As many times as it takes, look, as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: 自信がないから描いてきたんだよ
subtitles.english: I've been painting because I lack confidence

subtitles.original: 何回でも、ほら何回でも
subtitles.english: As many times as it takes, look, as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: 積み上げてきたことが武器になる
subtitles.english: What I've built up will become my weapon

subtitles.original: 周りを見たって、誰かと比べたって
subtitles.english: Even if I look around, even if I compare myself to others

subtitles.original: 僕にしかできないことはなんだ
subtitles.english: What is the one thing only I can do?

subtitles.original: 今でも自信なんかない、それでも
subtitles.english: I still don't have any confidence, but even so

subtitles.original: 感じたことない気持ち
subtitles.english: A feeling I've never felt before

subtitles.original: 知らずにいた想い
subtitles.english: Thoughts I never knew I had

subtitles.original: あの日踏み出して、初めて感じたこの痛みも全部
subtitles.english: Stepping out that day, all this pain I felt for the first time too

subtitles.original: 好きなものと向き合うことで
subtitles.english: By facing the things I love

subtitles.original: 触れたまだ小さな光
subtitles.english: I touched a light that is still small

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、行こう、あとは楽しむだけだ
subtitles.english: It's okay, let's go, the rest is just to enjoy it

subtitles.original: ああ、全てを掛けて描く
subtitles.english: Ah, I paint with everything I've got

subtitles.original: 自分にしか出せない色で
subtitles.english: With colors that only I can produce

subtitles.original: 朝も夜も走り続け
subtitles.english: Running through both morning and night

subtitles.original: 見つけ出した青い光
subtitles.english: The blue light that I found

subtitles.original: 好きなものと向き合うこと
subtitles.english: Facing the things I love
